WizardTD.entities.monsters.movement

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.entities.monsters.movement.Path

  • public class Path
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Path(Board board, Path existingPath)
      Returns a copy of an existing path as a new object such that it can be used by another monster.
      Path(Board board, Tile initialTile)
      Finds and creates optimal path to wizard house from the specified tile on the current game board.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generatePath()
      Uses breadth-first search to find the optimal path from a given starting location to the Wizard House.
      java.util.Queue<Tile> getPathToCopy()
      Retrives the raw queue of tiles typically for the purpose of copying a path.
      Tile moveToNextTile()
      Removes the tile at the front of the queue, thereby exposing the next tile.
      void resetTraversalState()
      Iterates through every tile in the game board matrix and sets the traversal state to false in preparation for another path finding operation.
      Tile viewNextTile()
      Retrives without removing the next tile in the path queue.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Path

        public Path(Board board,
            Tile initialTile)
        Finds and creates optimal path to wizard house from the specified tile on the current game board.
        Parameters:
        board - the current game board.
        initialTile - the tile from which to search for the optimal path.

      • Path

        public Path(Board board,
            Path existingPath)
        Returns a copy of an existing path as a new object such that it can be used by another monster.
        Parameters:
        board - the current game board.
        existingPath - an existing path to copy.

    • Method Detail

      • resetTraversalState

        public void resetTraversalState()
        Iterates through every tile in the game board matrix and sets the traversal state to false in preparation for another path finding operation.

      • getPathToCopy

        public java.util.Queue<Tile> getPathToCopy()
        Retrives the raw queue of tiles typically for the purpose of copying a path.
        Returns:
        Exposes the queue of tiles that constitutes the path

      • generatePath

        public void generatePath()
        Uses breadth-first search to find the optimal path from a given starting location to the Wizard House.

      • viewNextTile

        public Tile viewNextTile()
        Retrives without removing the next tile in the path queue.
        Returns:
        The next tile in the path.

      • moveToNextTile

        public Tile moveToNextTile()
        Removes the tile at the front of the queue, thereby exposing the next tile.
        Returns:
        The tile at the front of the path queue.
